desc.cn: MacPorts 是一个易于使用的系统，用于编译、安装和管理开源软件
desc.en: MacPorts is an easy to use system for compiling, installing, and managing open source software

darwin/curl.cmd:
curl -O https://distfiles.macports.org/MacPorts/MacPorts-2.8.1.tar.bz2 \
&& tar xf MacPorts-2.8.1.tar.bz2 \
&& cd MacPorts-2.8.1/ \
&& ./configure \
&& make \
&& sudo make install

darwin/git.cmd:
mkdir -p /opt/mports
&& cd /opt/mports
&& git clone https://github.com/macports/macports-base.git
&& cd macports-base
&& git checkout v2.8.1
&& sudo make install
